name: Nakhli Khoury
what_you_do: Nakhli Khoury is an Awakening Coach and Compliance & Ethics professional who guides individuals through spiritual awakening, burnout recovery, and finding purpose beyond corporate life.
who_you_serve: Corporate professionals and leaders feeling trapped, burned out, or seeking deeper alignment and purpose.
offering: Coaching, mentorship, consulting, workshops, speaking gigs, and interviews on spirituality, mental health, ethics, and navigating corporate-to-calling transitions.
bio: Nakhli Khoury is a Certified Life and Spiritual Coach, Kundalini Yoga teacher, and SOMA Breathwork instructor based in Zug, Switzerland. A bestselling co-author of 'Corporate to Calling,' he serves as both a Compliance & Ethics Director and an Awakening Coach guiding corporate professionals toward purpose and inner resilience. He is recognized as a global change agent and super connector across the domains of spirituality, consciousness, and mental health.
business_focus: Guiding corporate professionals through spiritual awakening, burnout, and the transition from corporate careers to purpose-driven lives.
service_provided: Coaching, Mentorship, Consulting, Workshops, Speaking, Interviews, Networking
